trans-unit.source: Describes the type of SQL command used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> controls when performing a database operation.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 SQL 명령의 유형에 대해 설명 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> 데이터베이스 작업을 수행할 때 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceCommandType enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controls to describe the type of SQL command contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: SqlDataSourceCommandType 열거형에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>SQL 명령에 포함 된 형식을 설명 하는 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The Text value indicates that the text is a SQL query or command string while the StoredProcedure value indicates that the text is the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 값 StoredProcedure 값 이면 텍스트는 저장된 프로시저의 이름을 텍스트는 SQL 쿼리 또는 명령 문자열을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The text contained in a corresponding text property is the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 해당 텍스트 속성에 포함 된 텍스트에는 저장된 프로시저의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The text contained in a corresponding text property is a SQL query or command.
trans-unit.target: 해당 텍스트 속성에 포함 된 텍스트에는 SQL 쿼리 또는 명령입니다.
